page.title: 11Whitehills Coast 'Tee-names'
page.content:
Every rock or pool along the coast has had its own {tee-name}(nickname) from time immemorial. Some,with translations, are :
New Herber New Harbour Codlin Craig Small Cod Crag Sanny Bunks Sand Banks Scauper's Craig Mussel Workers' Crag Deevil's Steen Devil's Stone Bark Holes Nets were dipped in bark solution here. Muckle Scaup Big Mussel Bed Banny Pot Minnow Pool (Pothole) Poopie Moo Sewage Outfall (From poop-fart or excrete; moo-mouth) Muckle Herry Big Harry Steam Rick Steam Smoke or Vapour Rotten Den Stinking Hole The Souter The Shoemaker Lady Pantine) Two warm paddling or Warm Nellie) bathing pools.
